title: PODCAST: Marc Jacobs and Millennials
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, October 3, 2013

description: Weekly jobless claims went up a bit. A look at the employment challenges facing Millennials. And what happens to a luxury brand when its exclusivity is exhausted?
contentencoded:
Weekly jobless claims rose slightly to 308,000, but still a bit lower than expected.

Meet Jeremy Feador, a 27-year-old part-time worker in Cleveland, Ohio who has been struggling to find full-time employment.

Did the popularity of Marc Jacobs bags hurt Louis Vuitton?
